name: Ratfolk Mercenary
description: The Ratfolk Mercenary is a small humanoid known for its agile movements and tactical prowess in combat. Clad in leather armor, it embodies both stealth and efficiency, favoring dexterous attacks over brute strength.
memorable: This mercenary utilizes teamwork and a variety of tactical abilities, making it a formidable opponent in group battles.
goals: To serve as a hired combatant, utilizing agility and teamwork to overcome foes.
relations: Often works alongside allies in tactical scenarios, benefiting from synergies with other mercenaries or companions.
environment: Typically found in urban settings or battlegrounds where contracts for mercenaries are common.
strengths: Exceptional dexterity allows for stealth and evasive maneuvers; bonuses from teamwork enhance combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Constitution make it vulnerable in direct melee confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with shortswords and darts, capable of additional biting damage if landing successful sword strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Chopper Squad, increasing melee damage output significantly when near allies.
equipment: Leather armor enhances its agility without sacrificing mobility.
skills: Possesses impressive skills in Acrobatics and Stealth, making it highly capable in stealthy and agile tasks.
additional_information: Benefits from Pack Tactics when allies are nearby, gaining advantage on attack rolls.
Can maneuver through the spaces of larger creatures, enhancing its tactical positioning.
Has reaction abilities to protect its employer, showcasing its role as a supportive combatant.
Possesses a high Dexterity saving throw, making it adept at dodging attacks.
Versatile in combat with a combination of melee and ranged attacks.

cunning ratfolk warrior skilled in ambush
